familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Capital Gains Rent or Royalties income from Kushner Village 2 Member LLC (Rental Apartments in New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Kushner Village 2 Member LLC (Rental Apartments In New York, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Capital Gains Rent or Royalties income from Kushner Village 2 Member LLC (Rental Apartments in New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This asset has been divested.
familyMemberEthics.business: Kushner Village 2 Member LLC (Rental Apartments In New York, NY)
